projektMunka

Viewing the Documentation

To view the documentation locally on your machine, please follow these steps:

Running the Documentation

  1. Ensure that the latest version of Python is installed on your system.
  2. Open a command prompt or terminal and navigate to the directory containing the documentation.
  3. Run the following command: python -m http.server --directory _site.
  4. Open your web browser and enter the following address: http://localhost:8000.

You can now view the project documentation in your browser, in English.

Testing Documentation

For the latest testing documentation and additional information, please visit the project's wiki page.
